Uses of Class
backend.peripheral.Device

  • Packages that use Device 
    Package Description
    backend
    Contains the behind the scenes classes utilized by PEMS.
    backend.peripheral
    Package used to store classes pertaining to the detection and importation of evidence files from external hardware.

    • Uses of Device in backend

      Fields in backend with type parameters of type Device 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Device> PeripheralManager.devices 
      Methods in backend that return types with arguments of type Device 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Device> PeripheralManager.getDevices()
      Returns an ArrayList of Device objects representing the peripheral devices currently connected to the computer.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Device> PeripheralManager.retrieveDevices()
      Operating system dependent method that scans the system for and stores information about any external devices.
